home-title: Fablo - Web3 Learn to Earn Platform | Participate in Events and Earn Rewards
home-description: Fablo is a Web3 learning platform where users can participate in events and earn rewards (points, tokens). Join now to learn and earn!
home-keywords: Blockchain, Web3, Quest to earn, Learn to earn, Events, Tokens
community-list-description: Explore & participate in various web3 communities

event-list-description: Check out various events running on Fablo!
vote-list-description: Check out various Vote rounds and participate to earn rewards.
vote-detail-description: {{voteTitle}} | Participate in Voting and earn rewards.
